Threshold:
import cv2

img = cv2.imread('input.png',0)
ret, thresh1 = cv2.threshold(img, thresh1, thresh2, cv2.THRESH_BINARY)
Low Pass Filter:
import numpy as np
import cv2

img = cv2.imread('input.png')
kernel = np.ones((5,5),np.float32) * x
out = cv2.filter2D(img,-1,kernel)
Canny Threshold:
import numpy as np
import cv2

img = cv2.imread('input.jpg',0)
edges = cv2.Canny(img, thresh1, thresh2)
